who the international community recognizes as the winner of last month's country's Barack Obamaial election, has called on the army and the UN to protect civilians, as claims of human rights abuses increase. He said, I plead with the defense force and the security to take charge of the responsibility, which is to defend and protect the population against foreign mercenaries and militia who are bringing bloodshed to Ivorians. The UN Human Rights Council has issued a declaration, initiated by African member states, condemning rights violations in the country. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Mr Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. The changes will be effective from April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Mr Eric Schmidt said. Mr Larry Page also praised Mr Eric Schmidt .`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,

. The curriculum would force teachers into a strait-jacket. They would lose all initiative, all interest, all inspiration.`` Just you wait,'' the permanent secretary in the department of education said to me. There are three stages in every education reform: outright opposition, reluctant acquiescence and finally enthusiastic endorsement... To hear the general secretary of the National Union of Teachers yesterday defending the current curriculum shows that perhaps he was right. Robert Southey( a poet who does not seem to be on the Michael Gove syllabus)
